levels.title: UNION - Szenario-Zuordnung
levels.description: Verbinde jedes Szenario mit der passenden Entscheidung und der Begruendung.

pairs.left: Szenario 1: Basic ID Sync Merge IDs from 'Active_Users' and 'Archived_Users'. Both have exactly one INT column.

pairs.right: Warum passend 1: Both queries have 1 column of type INT.

pairs.left: Szenario 2: Contact Fusion Merge phone numbers. Wait, Query B has a Name as well!

pairs.right: Warum passend 2: Column count mismatch (1 vs 2).

pairs.left: Szenario 3: Type Mismatch Repel Try to merge IDs with Emails. The types won't snap!

pairs.right: Warum passend 3: Type mismatch at Position 1 (INT vs STR).

pairs.left: Szenario 4: The Perfect Match Check if Product and Service catalogs are compatible.

pairs.right: Warum passend 4: Perfect match: 3 columns, INT-STR-DEC sequence.
